findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: AUTONOMY ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects unbounded autonomy patterns that could lead to runaway behavior: escalate to
findings.snippet: **Error Handling**: Failed tasks automatically retry once on Sonnet, then escalate to human review.
findings.remediation: Review and remove autonomy abuse pattern
